alert.note: Alert for Hardee; Highlands; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Highlands, southern Sumter, eastern Pasco, southeastern Hernando, Hardee, Polk and northeastern Hillsborough Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Mascotte to 10 miles southeast of Wauchula. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Plant City, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Zephyrhills, Avon Park, Dade City, Wauchula, Bushnell, St. Leo, Hillsborough River State Park, Zephyrhills South, Zephyrhills West, Medulla, Ona, Fussels Corner and Hill n Dale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hardee; Highlands; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter
